industry_and_process.specific_processes: Primer/Topcoat application and solvent use (Primer P60A, Seevenax Primer 113-22, Topcoat F69 grau, Diestone DLS, D760, Celomer, 4125/2047 BAC707)
industry_and_process.raw_materials: Primer P60A; Seevenax Primer 113-22; Topcoat F69 grau; Diestone DLS (1-Methoxy-2-propanol); D760 (Benzylalkohol); Celomer, 4125/2047 BAC707

customer_knowledge_and_expectations.previous_experience: Pilot/bench measurements across UV power levels and plasma energy densities with combined Plasma 6Wh UV 960W/1440W configurations.

data_quality_issues.issue: No explicit VOC concentrations (mg/Nm3 or ppm) provided for individual substances
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Prevents accurate sizing, energy demand estimation, and compliance checks; only relative 'Aus/An' and 'Abbau [%]' shown without inlet concentration units
examples: Sheets '4125', 'F69', 'Diestone', 'Seevenax', 'D760' list Aus/An/Abbau [%] but no mg/Nm3 or ppm

data_quality_issues.issue: Flow rate varies by test condition without a defined design basis
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Unclear which m3/h should be used for system design; risk of under/oversizing

data_quality_issues.issue: CAS numbers missing for identified VOCs
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Additional effort required to confirm hazards and regulatory thresholds; affects risk assessment

data_quality_issues.issue: Environmental and process conditions not reported (temperature, humidity, pressure, oxygen, particulates)
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Affects technology selection, oxidation efficiency, by-product formation, and safety margins
examples: No degC, %, mbar values provided in any sheet

data_quality_issues.impact_description: Impacts CAPEX/OPEX optimization and maintenance planning

data_quality_issues.issue: Measurement completeness issues and missing data entries
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Data gaps reduce confidence in reported Abbau [%] and comparability between tests
examples: F69: '20 Hz 150mg XX m3/h ... nicht möglich Schwankungen zu gross'

data_quality_issues.issue: Potential carcinogen formation risk from oxidation of alcohols and aromatics in coating solvents
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Alcohol and aromatic oxidation under UV/Plasma can form formaldehyde/acetaldehyde (IARC Group 1/2A); requires catalytic polishing and monitoring
examples: Solvent components include 1-Methoxy-2-propanol and Benzylalkohol; UV/Plasma oxidation tests performed
